public class MicroGridLayout
extends prefuse.action.layout.Layout

Class that displays all VisualItems in a grid.

Constructor Detail

MicroGridLayout

public MicroGridLayout(java.lang.String group,
                       int numRows,
                       int numCols,
                       double height,
                       double width,
                       java.lang.String rowName,
                       java.lang.String colName,
                       int xMargin,
                       int yMargin,
                       double mx,
                       double my)
Constructs the layout

Parameters:
group - group in which VisualItems are
numRows - number of rows for the grid
numCols - number of columns for the grid
height - height in pixels of the grid
width - width in pixels of the grid
rowName - field name in the items for the int identifier of its row
colName - field name in the items for the int identifier of its column
xMargin - x coordinate of the top-left square of the layout
yMargin - y coordinate of the top-left square of the layout
mx - factor for distortion of width
my - factor for distortion of height
